examples.example: 只要我们保持积极的心态，就一定能克服所有困难。

translate.english: As long as we keep a positive attitude, we will definitely be able to overcome all difficulties.

examples.example: 只要努力奋斗，就一定能实现自己的梦想。

translate.english: As long as you strive hard, you will definitely be able to realize your own dream.

examples.example: 只要我们坚持不懈地努力，就一定会收获成功的喜悦。

translate.english: As long as we persevere in our efforts, we will definitely reap the joy of success.
